title: Mollusk Whistle
summaries: The Mollusk Whistle is a mount-summoning item that summons a rideable Flamingo mount. It can be purchased from the Zoologist for 20 after filling out 25% (135 entries) of the Bestiary.

The mount allows players to float in water, similar to using an Inner Tube, and dive by holding ▼ Down. The mount bobs to the surface when the ▼ Down key is released, and if deep enough, the player will launch out of the water into the air.

statistics.Buy: 20
statistics.Sell: 4
